Ripples Foundation

Help others by giving

The King will reply, Truly I tell you, whatever you did for one of the least of
these brothers and sisters of mine, you did for me. ~ Matthew 25:34-40

Get involved in our causes About

more about us

Our Vision

To create a world filled with strong vibrations of ripples of love and kindness.




About Us

Ripples Foundation is a charity initiative with a mission to further spread love & kindness to vulnerable children such as orphans, the sick, the needy and disabled through fundraising for, and donating to charitable causes.

Our MIssion

To demonstrate to as many OVCs as possible that they matter and that they are loved. We aspire to support at least 10 OVCs homes, in addition to at least 100 independent children by the year 2022

Get involved where it matters

Connect with us and make a real difference to the life of those in need.

Get Involved

Your generosity makes our work possible. Whether you contribute financially or as advocate for good.

Learn more about our causes

Your generosity makes our work possible. Whether you contribute financially or as advocate for good.

Get Involved Our motto

Paying love and kindness forward

Your generosity makes our work possible. Whether you contribute financially or as advocate for good, you make a real and lasting difference in peoples lives.

Start now

Get Involved

item.title: Hello world!
item.dc:creator: barnaboy
item.content:encoded: Welcome to WordPress. This is your first post. Edit or delete it, then start writing!

wp:comment.wp:comment_content: Hi, this is a comment. To get started with moderating, editing, and deleting comments, please visit the Comments screen in the dashboard. Commenter avatars come from Gravatar.

item.dc:creator: barnaboy
item.content:encoded:
Contact Us today

Connect with us and make a real difference to the life of those in need.

Address

Plot 26, Golf Course Rd
Lower Kololo
Kampala
Uganda

Telephone

+256 774 012 739

Email

ripplesfoundation2020@gmail.com

Ripples Foundation is a charity foundation
with a mission to further spread love & kindness
to vulnerable children such as orphans, the sick,
the needy and disabled through fundraising for,
and donating to charitable causes.

Contact us

  • Tel.: +256 774 012 739
  • Mail : ripplesfoundation2020@gmail.com
  • Address: Plot 26, Golf Course Rd, Lower Kololo, Kampala

talk to us

2020, Ripples Foundation. All Rights Reserved

Paying love and kindness forward

item.title: Privacy Policy
item.dc:creator: barnaboy
item.content:encoded:
Who we are

Our website address is: http://theripplesfoundation.org.

What personal data we collect and why we collect it

Comments

When visitors leave comments on the site we collect the data shown in the comments form, and also the visitor’s IP address and browser user agent string to help spam detection.

An anonymized string created from your email address (also called a hash) may be provided to the Gravatar service to see if you are using it. The Gravatar service privacy policy is available here: https://automattic.com/privacy/. After approval of your comment, your profile picture is visible to the public in the context of your comment.

Media

If you upload images to the website, you should avoid uploading images with embedded location data (EXIF GPS) included. Visitors to the website can download and extract any location data from images on the website.

Contact forms

Cookies

If you leave a comment on our site you may opt-in to saving your name, email address and website in cookies. These are for your convenience so that you do not have to fill in your details again when you leave another comment. These cookies will last for one year.

If you visit our login page, we will set a temporary cookie to determine if your browser accepts cookies. This cookie contains no personal data and is discarded when you close your browser.

When you log in, we will also set up several cookies to save your login information and your screen display choices. Login cookies last for two days, and screen options cookies last for a year. If you select "Remember Me", your login will persist for two weeks. If you log out of your account, the login cookies will be removed.

If you edit or publish an article, an additional cookie will be saved in your browser. This cookie includes no personal data and simply indicates the post ID of the article you just edited. It expires after 1 day.

Embedded content from other websites

Articles on this site may include embedded content (e.g. videos, images, articles, etc.). Embedded content from other websites behaves in the exact same way as if the visitor has visited the other website.

These websites may collect data about you, use cookies, embed additional third-party tracking, and monitor your interaction with that embedded content, including tracking your interaction with the embedded content if you have an account and are logged in to that website.

Analytics

Who we share your data with

How long we retain your data

If you leave a comment, the comment and its metadata are retained indefinitely. This is so we can recognize and approve any follow-up comments automatically instead of holding them in a moderation queue.

For users that register on our website (if any), we also store the personal information they provide in their user profile. All users can see, edit, or delete their personal information at any time (except they cannot change their username). Website administrators can also see and edit that information.

What rights you have over your data

If you have an account on this site, or have left comments, you can request to receive an exported file of the personal data we hold about you, including any data you have provided to us. You can also request that we erase any personal data we hold about you. This does not include any data we are obliged to keep for administrative, legal, or security purposes.

Where we send your data

Visitor comments may be checked through an automated spam detection service.

Your contact information

Additional information

How we protect your data

What data breach procedures we have in place

What third parties we receive data from

What automated decision making and/or profiling we do with user data

Industry regulatory disclosure requirements

item.title: Homepage
item.dc:creator: barnaboy
item.content:encoded:
Ripples Foundation

paying love and kindness forward

The King will reply, Truly I tell you, whatever you did for one of the least of
these brothers and sisters of mine, you did for me. ~ Matthew 25:34-40

Get involved in our causes About

A little about us

Our Vision

To create a world filled with strong vibrations of ripples of love and kindness.




About Us

Ripples Foundation is a charity initiative with a mission to further spread love & kindness to vulnerable children such as orphans, the sick, the needy and disabled through fundraising for, and donating to charitable causes.

Our MIssion

To demonstrate to as many OVCs as possible that they matter and that they are loved. We aspire to support at least 10 OVCs homes, in addition to at least 100 independent children by the year 2022

Get involved where it matters

Connect with us and make a real difference to the life of those in need.

Get Involved

Your generosity makes our work possible. Whether you contribute financially or as advocate for good.

Learn more about our causes

We believe one person may not be able to create a substantial impact on society but with joint force through acts of love and kindness to the less privileged has a bigger ripple effect on an even bigger society.

Get Involved Our motto

Paying love and kindness forward

Your generosity makes our work possible. Whether you contribute financially or as an advocate for good, you make a real and lasting difference in peoples lives.

Start now

Get Involved

How to start?

Leave us a message through the form at the bottom of the page, join our newsletter and make a donation in form of finances or physical items that would support our cause in creating ripples of love in the lives of under privileged children.

We are here to help!

The King will reply, Truly I tell you, whatever you did for one of the least of these brothers and sisters of mine, you did for me. ~ Matthew 25:34-40

get involved

how you can help

Make a donation

Your generosity makes our work possible. Whether you contribute financially or as advocate for good. Click the button below to make your much needed donation.

learn more

Join our Efforts

Join us by living a message through the form at the bottom of this page, expressing how you'd love to support our efforts.

talk to us

Our latest activity

On the 20th June 2020, we will be visiting Loving Babies' Home.

&

On the 27th June 2020, we will be visiting Jajja Flora Children's Home.

Our efforts in visiting in this visit are aimed at supporting orphaned babies aged 0-5 years with essentials like diapers, milk, clean clothes and food.

Get Involved So far we have supported 10 Countries 5285 People 3836 Raised

From our socials

Newsletter

Stay up to date on global charitable giving news & trends, read stories of philanthropy, learn how the philanthropic landscape is changing be the first to know about our upcoming events.

Subscribe

* indicates required

Ripples Foundation is a charity foundation
with a mission to further spread love & kindness
to vulnerable children such as orphans, the sick,
the needy and disabled through fundraising for,
and donating to charitable causes.

Contact us

  • Tel.: +256 774 012 739
  • Mail : ripplesfoundation2020@gmail.com
  • Address: Plot 26, Golf Course Rd, Lower Kololo, Kampala

item.title: You can live without money
item.dc:creator: barnaboy
item.content:encoded: Mea delenit repudiare incorrupte in, ea inimicus forensibus vel, te rebum doctus his. An mazim integre concludaturque nec, te duo illum mucius intellegebat. Fugit regione cu ius, eum ut cibo brute mandamus. Vel alienum volutpat ea, nonumy deleniti mediocritatem ut quo.

item.title: Homepage
item.dc:creator: Joshua
item.content:encoded:
Ripples Foundation

paying love and kindness forward

The King will reply, Truly I tell you, whatever you did for one of the least of
these brothers and sisters of mine, you did for me. ~ Matthew 25:34-40

Get involved in our causes About

A little about us

Our Vision

To create a world filled with strong vibrations of ripples of love and kindness.




About Us

Ripples Foundation is a charity initiative with a mission to further spread love & kindness to vulnerable children such as orphans, the sick, the needy and disabled through fundraising for, and donating to charitable causes.

Our MIssion

To demonstrate to as many OVCs as possible that they matter and that they are loved. We aspire to support at least 10 OVCs homes, in addition to at least 100 independent children by the year 2022

Get involved where it matters

Connect with us and make a real difference to the life of those in need.

Get Involved

Your generosity makes our work possible. Whether you contribute financially or as advocate for good.

Learn more about our causes

We believe one person may not be able to create a substantial impact on society but with joint force through acts of love and kindness to the less privileged has a bigger ripple effect on an even bigger society.

Get Involved Our motto

Paying love and kindness forward

Your generosity makes our work possible. Whether you contribute financially or as an advocate for good, you make a real and lasting difference in peoples lives.

Start now

Get Involved

How to start?

Leave us a message through the form at the bottom of the page, join our newsletter and make a donation in form of finances or physical items that would support our cause in creating ripples of love in the lives of under privileged children.

We are here to help!

The King will reply, Truly I tell you, whatever you did for one of the least of
these brothers and sisters of mine, you did for me. ~ Matthew 25:34-40

get involved

how you can help

Make a donation

Your generosity makes our work possible. Whether you contribute financially or as advocate for good. Click the button below to make your much needed donation.

learn more

Join our Efforts

Join us by living a message through the form at the bottom of this page, expressing how you'd love to support our efforts.

talk to us

Our latest activity

On the 20th June 2020, we will be visiting Loving Babies' Home.

&

On the 27th June 2020, we will be visiting Jajja Flora Children's Home.

Our efforts in visiting in this visit are aimed at supporting orphaned babies aged 0-5 years with essentials like diapers, milk, clean clothes and food.

Get Involved So far we have supported 10 Countries 5285 People 3836 Raised

From our socials

Newsletter

Stay up to date on global charitable giving news & trends, read stories of philanthropy, learn how the philanthropic landscape is changing be the first to know about our upcoming events.

Subscribe

* indicates required

Ripples Foundation is a charity foundation
with a mission to further spread love & kindness
to vulnerable children such as orphans, the sick,
the needy and disabled through fundraising for,
and donating to charitable causes.

Contact us

  • Tel.: +256 774 012 739
  • Mail : ripplesfoundation2020@gmail.com
  • Address: Plot 26, Golf Course Rd, Lower Kololo, Kampala

talk to us

2020, Ripples Foundation. All Rights Reserved

Paying love and kindness forward

item.title: Visit to Jaja Flora Childrens' Home
item.dc:creator: Joshua
item.content:encoded:
On 27th June 2020, Ripples Foundation visited Loving Hearts Babies' Home and extended the love and kindness to the children with open discussions and supplies.

Take a look.

item.title: Visit to Loving Hearts Babies' Home
item.dc:creator: Joshua
item.content:encoded: On 20th June 2020, Ripples Foundation reached out to Loyal Hearts Babies' Home. We shared stories and had fun. We donated supplies/needs such as sugar, food, soap, toothpaste, toys, candy and so much more to the home encouraging it to keep on caring out the works of love to these young innocent souls
